title: Snoop

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Interview. You learn of two random other players. You learn all 3 of their roles, but not who has which.
- At night, if you can guess the role of every player in the game, you gain permanent basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
